title: Bug 27408Preference convertor also maps to font registry
description: 20021126If you set the Java Editor font the text editor font in the workbenchpreference store is also set. This does not appear to affect the font registry(i.e. the correct font is used in text editors) but it will show up as changedin the preference page.STEPS1) Open a text editor2) Set the Java editor font3) Text editor does not change4) Open the fonts preference page5) The text font will have the value of your java editor font.One solution for this is to switch to the new font propogation support. SeeBug 27402.
